casebody.data:
JPMORGAN CHASE BANK, N.A., a National Association, Appellant,
v.
EQUISOURCE, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, acting as Trustee FOR the 6857 AMERISTEAD TRUST, Respondent. No. 72776 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 09, 2018

Smith Larsen & Wixom

Cooper Coons Ltd.

ORDER DISMISSING APPEAL

Pursuant to the stipulation of the parties, and cause appearing, this appeal is dismissed. The parties shall bear their own costs and attorney fees. NRAP 42(b).

It is so ORDERED.
